workflow.name: HOG Feature Extraction Pipeline
workflow.description: Extract HOG features from image dataset for machine learning

input.description: Folder containing class subfolders with images (auto-detects PNG, JPG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF, TXT)

preprocessing.description: Image preprocessing: resize (if enabled) and convert to grayscale

hog_parameters.description: HOG descriptor parameters - produces 144 features per image

output.description: Output CSV file with HOG features

processing.description: Processing options: -1 = process all images, >0 = limit per class

esp32.description: ESP32 camera config(for hog lib esp32 ver): (GRAYSCALE|RGB565|RGB888|YUV422|JPEG), (NEAREST_NEIGHBOR|BILINEAR|AREA_AVERAGE)
